description.value:
An eidolon can use its tail to bash nearby foes, granting it a tail slap attack. This attack is a secondary attack. The tail slap deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). The eidolon must possess the tail evolution to take this evolution.

This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the tail evolution.
